title: Add 4th Home mode tile and placeholder route for future real APA match logging

requirements.summary: Add a fourth ModeCard tile on Home that navigates to the new real APA match logging placeholder page.
acceptanceCriteria: Home screen (frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx) shows four ModeCard tiles instead of three.
The new tile has an English title and description indicating it is for official/real APA match logging and/or that it is a placeholder.
Clicking the new tile navigates to the new placeholder route without errors.

file_operations.description: Add a 4th tile to the existing mode grid using the existing ModeCard component (card UI + built-in navigation via TanStack Router). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing. Update the grid layout (currently lg:grid-cols-3) to a 4-tile-friendly layout (e.g., lg:grid-cols-4) and wire the new tile's path to the new dedicated placeholder route path. Ensure all new user-facing text is in English and clearly labeled as official/real APA match logging placeholder.

requirements.summary: Create a new placeholder page component for the 4th mode and register a new TanStack Router route to render it.
acceptanceCriteria: A new page component exists (new file under frontend/src/pages/...) that renders a simple, blank/placeholder experience with English text (e.g., heading + short message).
The placeholder page includes a clear way to navigate back to Home (e.g., a “Back to Home” button).
frontend/src/App.tsx registers a new route path (new, dedicated path) that renders the placeholder page.
Navigating directly to the new route path renders the placeholder page successfully.

file_operations.description: Create a new placeholder page that displays a simple heading and short English message indicating this is a placeholder for official/real APA match logging. Include a clear 'Back to Home' control using the existing shadcn/ui Button component and TanStack Router navigation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Register a new dedicated TanStack Router route path that renders the new placeholder page component, and add it to the route tree so direct navigation to the path works.
